alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:53PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A couple strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson County through 115 PM CDT... At 1251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lac La Belle, or 7 miles west of Okauchee Lake. Another storm is several miles east of Johnson Creek. Both storms are slowly moving north. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Ixonia, Pipersville, and Lake Lac La Belle. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 270 and 278. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
